basic_text_iarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_text_iarchive.hpp
00011

00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016

00018 
00019 // archives stored as text - note these ar templated on the basic
00020 // stream templates to accommodate wide (and other?) kind of characters
00021 //
00022 // note the fact that on libraries without wide characters, ostream is
00023 // is not a specialization of basic_ostream which in fact is not defined
00024 // in such cases.   So we can't use basic_ostream<IStream::char_type> but rather
00025 // use two template parameters
00026 
00027 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00030 
00031 #include <boost/archive/detail/common_iarchive.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/serialization/string.hpp>
00033 
00034 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00035 
00036 namespace boost {
00037 namespace archive {
00038 
00049 template<class Archive>
00050 class basic_text_iarchive : 
00051     public detail::common_iarchive<Archive>
00052 {
00053 protected:
00054 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00055 public:
00056 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00057     // for some inexplicable reason insertion of "class" generates compile erro
00058     // on msvc 7.1
00059     friend detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00060 #else
00061     friend class detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00062 #endif
00063     // intermediate level to support override of operators
00064     // fot templates in the absence of partial function 
00065     // template ordering
00066     typedef detail::common_iarchive<Archive> detail_common_iarchive;
00067     template<class T>
00068     void load_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int)
00069     {
00070         this->detail_common_iarchive::load_override(t, 0);
00071     }
00072     // text file don't include the optional information 
00073     void load_override(class_id_optional_type & /*t*/, int){}
00074 
00075     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00076     load_override(class_name_type & t, int);
00077 
00078     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00079     init(void);
00080 
00081     basic_text_iarchive(unsigned int flags) : 
00082         detail::common_iarchive<Archive>(flags)
00083     {}
00084     ~basic_text_iarchive(){}
00085 };
00086 
00087 } // namespace archive
00088 } // namespace boost
00089 
00090 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00091 
00092 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IARCHIVE_HPP
